extension.summary: Created by BigNoid, Modded by Lockdown,

extension.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.2[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Add an option for 2, 3, and 4 seconds to fanart per image time[CR]- Fix star ratings in DialogSubtitles.xml[CR]- Vertical Menu fixes[CR]- Add option to Fullscreen Video Info to Show More Details when pressing down[CR]- Fixes for LibreELEC and CoreELEC settings menus[CR]- PVR fixes and additions[CR]- Add support for Atmos and DTS:X icons[CR]- Add Fanart List for Sets[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.1[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Make fullscreen info for recordings (Skin settings > Customization > Live TV) and add-ons (Skin settings > Customization > Video OSD) opt-in[CR]- Fix auto fullscreen music launching on PVR playback[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.0[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Add RightList and Logo views for Movie Sets[CR]- Fix for Square Widgets[CR]- Add option to move VideoOSD buttons to top[CR]- Add tiny posters to Fullscreen Wall[CR]- Caviar Dreams font fixes[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR]For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/mikes.e164/Aeon-Nox-s.e/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]

extension.summary: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata.
extension.description: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata. It supports ASF, FLAC, M4A, Monkey's Audio, MP3, Musepack, Ogg Opus, Ogg FLAC, Ogg Speex, Ogg Theora, Ogg Vorbis, True Audio, WavPack and OptimFROG audio files. All versions of ID3v2 are supported, and all standard ID3v2.4 frames are parsed. It can read Xing headers to accurately calculate the bitrate and length of MP3s. ID3 and APEv2 tags can be edited regardless of audio format. It can also manipulate Ogg streams on an individual packet/page level.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata.
extension.description: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata. It supports ASF, FLAC, M4A, Monkey's Audio, MP3, Musepack, Ogg Opus, Ogg FLAC, Ogg Speex, Ogg Theora, Ogg Vorbis, True Audio, WavPack and OptimFROG audio files. All versions of ID3v2 are supported, and all standard ID3v2.4 frames are parsed. It can read Xing headers to accurately calculate the bitrate and length of MP3s. ID3 and APEv2 tags can be edited regardless of audio format. It can also manipulate Ogg streams on an individual packet/page level.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

item.label: AB: $ADDON[script.artwork.beef 32410]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.artwork.beef) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)]

item.visible: Skin.HasSetting(enablecontext:script.artwork.beef.debug) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)]

extension.summary: Automatically adds extra artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Beef automatically adds extra artwork for TV shows and movies into your library. It grabs them from wonderful web services and the file system.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork sources: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database, TheAudioDB
extension.summary: Agrega automáticamente ilustraciones adicionales para sus medios.
extension.description: Artwork Beef agrega automáticamente ilustraciones adicionales para Series TV y Películas a su biblioteca. Las ilustraciones son agregadas desde Servicios web y el Sistema de archivos local.
extension.disclaimer: Fuente para ilustraciones: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database, TheAudioDB
extension.news:
v0.23.2 (2019-03-11) - Fix: limit image downloads on consistent web service errors - Fix: don't hide "extrafanart" folder settings
v0.23.1 (2018-12-02) - Fix: Remove generated thumb from Kodi texture cache when removing art - Fix: show actual message for "remote control" is required to pre-cache artwork
v0.23.0 (2018-11-17) - Feature: save configured artwork to Kodi's whitelist in advancedsettings.xml - Feature: cleaning remote URLs to artwork is optional - Feature: automatically adding keyart from TMDB is optional - Feature: action to update local artwork only for all media items - Fix: better handle non-UTF8 file paths - Fix: warn that "remote control" is required to pre-cache artwork
